thread.title: LIVE UPDATES: Ansonia at Torrington football

title: LIVE UPDATES: Ansonia at Torrington football
text:
Friday, October 23, 2015 6:05 PM EDT 
LIVE UPDATES: Ansonia at Torrington football Browse for Republican American Reprints The biggest game to date of the high school football season is here and The Zone has dispatched a team of correspondents to the Frost Complex to chronicle the action. We will have commentary during the game here, as well as video and photos. Go here for LIVE UPDATES More Stories About: The Zone 
Follow Us We encourage your feedback and dialog. Please be civil and respectful.If you're witty, to the point and quotable, your reader comments may also be included on the Around the Towns page of The Sunday Republican.
